title: Does art need to be beautiful? - Quora

response.answer_text: Beautiful is something you insist on in decoration. Art should ask questions and occasionally jolt you out of your comfort zone.  Francis Bacon's Screaming Pope series was inspired by Velázquez's Portrait of Pope Innocent X and Sergei Eisenstein's 1925 film Battleship Potemkin. Which is not to say that art can’t be beautiful. Beauty might or might not be intrinsic to the artist’s vision.
